Circulars for website(Cicular) 
No. CAS-5-11(MP)/2004-Div-I 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Dated :  19.02.2009 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Circular No. 04 /2009 
 
SUB : MINIMUM STANDARDS FOR CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
EQUIPMENTS.  MODIFICATION IN STANDARDS FOR BIO METRIC 
BASED ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEM. 
 
Refer this Bureau Circular No. 2/2007 dated 14.02.2007 in which the 
minimum standards / specifications of various AVSEC security equipments 
have been prescribed.  The specification in respect of bio metric based 
access control system given in appendix ‘J’ to Circular No. 2/2007 have 
been reviewed and it has been decided that the following amendments 
shall be carried out in appendix ‘J’. 
 
(i) 
Under the heading ‘Access Control Card and Reader’, in para-
1, the    fourth sentence shall be substituted by the following. 
 
 
    “All the data except the digital photograph of the 
employee will be stored in the card chip and formatted as per 
laid down BCAS AEC Card format”.  
 
          (ii) 
Under the heading ‘Access Control Card and Reader’ in para-1, 
the     sixth sentence shall be substituted by the following: -   
 
 
    “The data alongwith the digital photograph of the 
employee will then     be stored in the central server for further 
reference”. 
 
   (iii) 
 
Para 
5.10 
relating 
to 
‘Airport 
Entry 
Card’ 
Specifications shall be   deleted. 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution:  As per list attached.
